mapper.sql: plugin_id, `status`, context, extra, a_id, create_time, update_time, publish_time, `size`, md5, dr, url
mapper.update: update t_plugin set dr = 2 where plugin_id = #{pluginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_plugin (plugin_id, `status`, context, extra, a_id, create_time, update_time, publish_time, `size`, md5, dr, url) values (#{pluginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{context,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{url,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into t_plugin
plugin_id,
`status`,
context,
extra,
a_id,
create_time,
update_time,
publish_time,
`size`,
md5,
dr,
url,
#{pluginId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{context,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{extra,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_plugin
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
context = #{context,jdbcType=CHAR},
extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR},
a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`size` = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
url = #{url,jdbcType=CHAR},
where plugin_id = #{pluginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_plugin set `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, context = #{context,jdbcType=CHAR}, extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR}, a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `size` = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=CHAR}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=CHAR} where plugin_id = #{pluginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select p.plugin_id as pluginId, p.publish_time as publishTime, au.username, p.size, p.context, sc.name, a.versionname as versionName, p.status, p.extra from t_plugin p left join t_app_plu_ch apc on p.plugin_id = apc.plugin_id left join t_soft_channel sc on apc.soft_channel_id = sc.soft_channel_id left join t_app a on apc.app_id = a.app_id left join t_admin_user au on p.a_id = au.a_id where p.dr = 1 and p.a_id = #{aId}

select p.plugin_id as pluginId, apc.app_id as appId, apc.soft_channel_id as softChannelId, p.publish_time as publishTime, p.size, p.context, sc.name, a.versionname as versionName, p.status, p.extra from t_plugin p left join t_app_plu_ch apc on p.plugin_id = apc.plugin_id left join t_soft_channel sc on apc.soft_channel_id = sc.soft_channel_id left join t_app a on apc.app_id = a.app_id where p.plugin_id = #{pluginId} and p.dr = 1
